name: id
description: Unique identifier for the order item

name: user_id
description: Identifier for the user who placed the order

name: inventory_item_id
description: Identifier for the specific inventory item

name: status
description: Current status of the item (e.g., Complete, Shipped, Returned)

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the item was added to the order

name: shipped_at
description: Timestamp when the item was shipped

name: delivered_at
description: Timestamp when the item was delivered

name: returned_at
description: Timestamp when the item was returned

name: sale_price
description: The price at which the item was sold
